text: The O.C. was an American teenage drama television series based in Orange County, California. It was on for 4 seasons between August 5, 2003 and February 22, 2007. == Other websites == * Category:2003 American television series debuts Category:2007 American television series endings Category:2000s American drama television series Category:2000s soap operas Category:2000s teen television series Category:American soap operas Category:American teen television series Category:Television series set in California Category:English-language television programs
title: The O.C.
